text: Curve is the eighth studio album by Canadian alternative rock band, Our Lady Peace. Curve was released on April 3, 2012. Canadian heavyweight boxer George Chuvalo is featured on the cover of the album and vocal excerpts from him are also featured on the album's final track "Mettle". The band started recording the album six months after the release of their seventh studio album, Burn Burn. Curve debuted at #9 on the Canadian Albums Chart. ==Songs== ==References== Category:2012 albums Category:Our Lady Peace albums
title: Curve (album)
